/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the towering buildings that rise in the background. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, are punctuated with occasional red and blue accents, adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene.
